#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
#define s(x) scanf("%d",&x);
#define sl(x) scanf("%lld",&x);
#define p(x) printf("%d",x);
#define pl(x) printf("%lld",x);
#define fr(i,a,n) for(i=a;i<n;i++)
#define ln() printf("\n");
typedef long long ll;
ll mod=1000000007;
int main()
{
    int t;
    s(t);
    ll x,y,z,i,j;
        vector <ll> v;
        x=1;y=1;
        v.push_back(x);
        v.push_back(y);
        for(i=0;i<=88;i++)
        {
            z=x+y;
            v.push_back(z);
            x=y;
            y=z;
        }
    while(t--)
    {
        ll n;
        sl(n);
        for(i=0;i<n;i++)
        {
            if(v[i]%26==0)
                printf("Z");
            else
                printf("%c",(v[i]%26+64));
        }
        ln();
    }
    return 0;
}
